comments: I tried profiling with default settings and also with just execution time analysis & Collect method CPU time information. I need to stop everything and reload the trace file from disk to finally getting Eclipse showing at least some statistics. But from all the profiling views just a few shoe data and e.g. Coverage statistics show numbers in column "Methods missed" but always "0" in columns "Calls" and "Methods hit" - which is of course impossible.
Would it be possible to attach the application you are profiling? or workspace that you are using with the problem?
*** Bug 152349 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

mass update:
retarget from 4.3 to 4.4. Cannot be contained in 4.3 due to resource limtation.

I install Eclipse 3.2 and run Callisto Update sites for TPTP and its dependencies, then run a simple profile with execution time analysis & cpu time collection. I cannot reproduce the problem reported anymore.
